name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real Estate Open in Google Maps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real Estate plugin for Chrome. Users can open selected addresses in Google maps directly from the same page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real Estate Chrome Plugin: Instantly Open Property Addresses in Google Maps

This Chrome extension is designed specifically for real estate enthusiasts and professionals. It allows users to instantly open selected property addresses in Google Maps directly from the same webpageâ€”no need to open a new tab.

Whether you're browsing real estate listings or exploring investment properties, this plugin streamlines the process of looking up addresses, saving you time and effort.

How It Works:
1. Install the Real Estate Plugin for Chrome.
2. Highlight or select any property address on the page.
3. Click the red map pin icon in the top-right corner to instantly view the location on Google Maps.

Perfect for anyone actively searching for real estate properties online!
